summary: This code snippet is a regular expression (regex) pattern for deleting blank lines in a file. It will remove any line that consists of only whitespace, such as an empty line or a line containing spaces or tabs only.

details.comment: This code snippet is a regular expression (regex) pattern for deleting blank lines in a file. It will remove any line that consists of only whitespace, such as an empty line or a line containing spaces or tabs only.
